scripts.css-compile-compressed: sass --style compressed --source-map --embed-sources --no-error-css --load-path=node_modules scss/:dist/css/ && find dist/css -type f -name '*.css' -exec sh -c 'mv "$0" "${0%.css}.min.css"' {} \;
scripts.css-prefix-compressed: find dist/css -type f -name '*.min.css' ! -name '*.map' -exec grep -L '@charset\|@import' {} \; | xargs -I {} postcss --replace {} --use autoprefixer --map
scripts.css-prefix-expanded: find dist/css -type f -not -name '*.min.css' -not -name '*.map' -exec grep -L '@charset\|@import' {} \; | xargs -I {} postcss --replace {} --use autoprefixer --map
